About Me

Here some information about me

BIO

I am a student in Computer Science at DTI, Supsi. I am enthusiastic about Computer Science and enjoy learning new skills. My interest in computer science emerged in early secondary school when I developed a database for a project that is able to perform analysis of the most used app by an average user.

Web Science

Front End Developer, Web Developer, Tester

Tinaba is a hybrid mobile app that offer multiple services, such as payment, investment and many others. I have worked with Web Science agency as a front-end developer, web developer and also as a tester to check that all the micro-services are operating correctly. Make some bug fixes in login and registration process. Updated all the business home page interfaces with some features and added the possibility to switch the language.

Auditor Dr. Emanuele Ghielmetti

Auditor of accounts and Balances Sheets

Compilation of account entries. Budget analysis. Maintaining the integrity of the general accounting and drawing up graphics. Used accounting software(NetSuite) to manage all the invoices. Payment of fees on behalf of companies using f24 form.

INAIL

Controll and Acceptance of requests

Tax and installments calculation through the application of the regulations in force. Payment management to suppliers and customers. Inquiries and requests to sevice providers. Consultation and evaluation of estimates on behalf of customers. Reply to all the claims for accident at work and in their road to the house.
